mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SIT_SET ( ID, MAC_NO, PROD_MAC_NO, SITE_NAME, Z, Y, X, OFFSET, SITE_TYPE, LAYER, MAC_IN_SITE_NO, MATTER_NAME, AFTER_TIME, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodMacNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{z,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{y,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{x,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{offset,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{siteType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{macInSiteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_SIT_SET.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE SIT_SET
MAC_NO = #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_MAC_NO = #{prodMacNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SITE_NAME = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Z = #{z,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Y = #{y,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
X = #{x,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OFFSET = #{offset,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SITE_TYPE = #{siteType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAYER = #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAC_IN_SITE_NO = #{macInSiteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATTER_NAME = #{matterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AFTER_TIME = #{afterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, MAC_NO macNo, PROD_MAC_NO prodMacNo, SITE_NAME siteName, Z z, Y y, X x, OFFSET offset, SITE_TYPE siteType, LAYER layer, MAC_IN_SITE_NO macInSiteNo, MATTER_NAME matterName, AFTER_TIME afterTime, COMPANY_ID companyId, DELETED deleted, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, CREATE_BY createBy, MODIFY_BY modifyBy
